name: Happiness
description:
Happiness is something we all need. Some are even desperately trying to find happiness. We dream of happiness and we look for happiness everywhere.

But...

In fact, happiness is simpler and more intimate than we think. 

Maybe, the face of happiness is not so great. It can be small and fragile. Its appearances may be just a small seedling that has been planted, warm milk on a cold night, a place where we can relax or one morning in the warm sunshine.

All of these are "happiness".
